meta.title: Daily Reflection Pulse - Question Bank
meta.description: Curated inspirational questions to help reconnect with self during the day.
meta.author: zentala

instructions: Pick a random question based on timing (morning, afternoon, evening) or emotional state (stress, joy, boredom).

morning: What would make today meaningful, no matter what happens?
What gentle intention could guide me through this day?
What am I genuinely curious about today?
If I had no expectations, how would I want to start today?
afternoon: Am I still connected to what matters most today?
Is there a small joy I could allow myself right now?
Do I need a pause, or a push?
What would help me feel more grounded right now?
evening: What can I thank myself for today?
What did I feel most alive doing today?
Can I let go of any unfinished business for tonight?
What moment today made me smile, even for a second?

stress: What can I let go of right now, just a little bit?
If I could offer myself comfort, what would it be?
Is it safe for me to breathe deeply and slow down?
What is one gentle thing I can do for myself now?
joy: How can I savor this feeling a little longer?
What am I grateful for at this very moment?
Where in my body do I feel this joy?
Who or what would I love to share this joy with?
boredom: What small experiment could make this moment more interesting?
What would I explore if there were no wrong answers?
Can I let boredom be an invitation to create, not to escape?
If I could play like a child right now, what would I do?
